messages.message: we're using the spreadsheet view now, and it fills the empty space with placeholder column. It's not an actual data column just a placeholder
i understand it is being put in as a placeholder and looks extremely unstructured and also this changed between two customer demos and it looked like all prompts broke
Can we fix this extra column coming out everytime?

The additional space is intended for the user to be able to expand the columns horizontally into.
Do you mean we should expand all the columns to the complete width initially which they can contract?
It doesnt look like space to expand but rather appears as an extra column on the right
Yes also the columns should fit the output not expect someone to keep dragging them all the time i believe
This is what it looks like on the UI. which most likely seen as a column that we forgot to extract
